CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Expired',TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Closed(not won)'), IF(Roll_Up_Of_Proposal_Line_Item__c>0, IF( Quote_Type__c = 'Direct CPQ', IF(ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'IP Routing') || ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'Optics')|| ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'Nuage') || ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c ,'Optics - Wavelite'), If(Is_List_Price_Only__c=false,
'/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=DirectExportQuotePRMOBG&mode=touchless&outputType=NONE',null), '/apex/Apttus_XApps__EditInExcelLaunch?selectedRecordId='+Id+'&appName=DirectExportQuotePRMOBG&mode=touchless&outputType=NONE') ,NULL),null),null)
CustomField.label: Internal Detailed Quote Export for PrM
